abstract: A plaintive tribute to an ex-President by Stanley Newman. Or is it?
snippet: A plaintive tribute to an ex-President by Stanley Newman. Or is it?
lead_paragraph: MONDAY'S PUZZLE - If you're keeping track, another one of the unwritten rules of mainstream crossword theme development is: "Thou shalt not drag thy political leanings into the daily puzzle." The daily crossword is placed squarely (sorry) in the entertainment section as a respite from the rest of the day's news. Today, however, Stanley Newman, editor of the Newsday crossword puzzle, hitches his vowels to our 43rd president in what appears to be a tribute to George "DUBYA" Bush.
